Typealiases.html#/s:11MobilityKit18Permi.name: PermissionCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:11MobilityKit18Permi.abstract: The permission call back returns the status of the permission request

Structs/MBSegment.html#/s:11MobilityKit9.name: waypoints
Structs/MBSegment.html#/s:11MobilityKit9.abstract: Waypoints (list of coordinates) of this segement (including start and end of this segement)

Structs/MBModel.html#/s:11MobilityKit7MB.name: events
Structs/MBModel.html#/s:11MobilityKit7MB.abstract: List of events containing visits and trips (mobility timeline)

Structs/MBModel.html.name: MBModel
Structs/MBModel.html.abstract: The model contains the mobility timeline (events) and all visited places (clustered)

Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: mobilityKit(didDetect:)
Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Is called every time, when a new devices was detected (HFP or CarPlay)

Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: mobilityKit(didArrive:)
Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Is called every time, when an arrival event was detected

Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: mobilityKit(didDepart:)
Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Is called every time, when a departure event was detected

Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: mobilityKit(didChange:)
Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Is called every time, when a change of the transport type was detected (transport type or confidence level)

Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: mobilityKit(bluetooth:)
Protocols/MobilityKitDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Is called every time, when the bluetooth availablity changes (e.g. switching off Bluetooth)

Extensions/CLLocationCoordinate2D.html#/.name: distance(from:)
Extensions/CLLocationCoordinate2D.html#/.abstract: Calculate distance in meters between two coordinates

Enums/PermissionStatus.html#/s:11Mobilit.name: notDetermined
Enums/PermissionStatus.html#/s:11Mobilit.abstract: Permission was not requested by user yet

Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.name: low
Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.abstract: The probability of the detected transport type is low

Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.name: medium
Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.abstract: The probability of the detected transport type is medium

Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.name: high
Enums/MBTransportConfidence.html#/s:11Mo.abstract: The probability of the detected transport type is high

Enums/MBTransport.html#/c:@M@MobilityKit.name: unknown
Enums/MBTransport.html#/c:@M@MobilityKit.abstract: The transport type could not be determined

Enums/PermissionStatus.html.name: PermissionStatus
Enums/PermissionStatus.html.abstract: The permission status contains the current status of the permission

Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.name: bluetoothHFP
Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.abstract: If true, this device was connected using HFP

Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.name: carAudio
Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.abstract: If true, this device is a CarPlay device

Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.name: registeredAsCar
Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.abstract: If true, the device was registered as a car

Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.name: carProbability
Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.abstract: Indicating the probability that this device is a car (value between 0 and 1.0)

Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.name: inCarDevice
Classes/MBDevice.html#/s:11MobilityKit8M.abstract: If true, the device was identified as a car

Classes/MBTrip.html#/s:11MobilityKit6MBT.name: endPlace
Classes/MBTrip.html#/s:11MobilityKit6MBT.abstract: Place where the trip has ended. nil if the trip is not finished yet

Classes/MBTrip.html#/s:11MobilityKit6MBT.name: segments
Classes/MBTrip.html#/s:11MobilityKit6MBT.abstract: Segments of the trip (seperated by transport type)

Classes/MBLocation.html#/s:11MobilityKit.abstract: Compare geo position (latitude and longitude) of both locations

Classes/MBEvent.html#/s:11MobilityKit7MB.name: endDate
Classes/MBEvent.html#/s:11MobilityKit7MB.abstract: End date of this event. If event is not finished the date will be Date.distantFuture.

Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.name: delegate
Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.abstract: The delegate of the MobilityKit receiving the events and updates

Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.name: model()
Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.abstract: Get the current model with visited places and mobility timeline

Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.name: update(deviceUID:registeredAsCar:)
Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.abstract: Configure a detected device as a car

Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.name: checkMotionPermission()
Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.abstract: Check current state of permission to activity recognition

Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.name: checkLocationPermission()
Classes/MobilityKit.html#/s:11MobilityKi.abstract: Check current state of permission to location updates (always)

Classes/MBDevice.html.name: MBDevice
Classes/MBDevice.html.abstract: Detected connected device (CarPlay or Bluetooth using Handsfree Profile (HFP))

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
